local_intent: Visibility check, align to red_object, execute controlled push, re-verify visibility, settle, and retreat.
assumptions: red_object is visible before and after push
0.20 m push path on tabletop is clear
End-effector is free and able to contact-push
coherence_with_global: Implements the transfer phase using the same push parameters (distance=0.20, direction_deg=120, timeout_ms=2000), with pre-visibility check, alignment, brief settle, and safe retreat consistent with GLOBAL_BT and description.
